properties.title: A Wee Taste of Edinburgh
properties.description: Join us on this food and drink extravaganza to discover some of Edinburgh's hidden food and drink gems and learn why this city has been voted the number one destination to live in the UK. Come along if you want to eat, drink and live like a local!

link.label: Discover A Wee Taste of Edinburgh

properties.title: Aberlour Distillery
properties.description: Visit Aberlour Distillery, the birthplace of the award-winning Aberlour Single Malt and Home of A'bunadh.

properties.title: Annandale Distillery
properties.description: Annandale Distillery was established in 1836 and reborn in 2014 following an extensive £10.5million restoration project.  Once again single malt Scotch whisky is being produced in the region after almost a 100 year sleep.

properties.title: Arbikie Distillery
properties.description: Immerse yourself in a true field to bottle experience at the Arbikie Farm Distillery. Starting in the fields, learn how Arbikie distils its spirits from scratch, before enjoying a tutored tasting overlooking the expanse of Lunan Bay Beach.

properties.title: Ardbeg Distillery
properties.description: Follow your nose along the famous road from Port Ellen and you will eventually come to the most welcoming distillery on the island. Ardbeg's white-washed walls can be found nestling in a rocky cove on Islay's southern tip. Located on the rugged shores of Islay, Ardbeg Distillery is revered by whisky connoisseurs the world over.

properties.title: Ardnahoe Distillery
properties.description: Ardnahoe Distillery. Islay's ninth and newest Distillery.

properties.title: Ardnamurchan Distillery
properties.description: Now in its fifth year of welcoming visitors, The Ardnamurchan Distillery and Visitor Centre is located on the beautiful and wild Ardnamurchan Peninsula.

properties.title: Auchentoshan Distillery
properties.description: Established in 1823, Auchentoshan (pronounced Ock-un-tosh-un) Distillery is on the mainland of Scotland, situated on the A82 between Glasgow and Loch Lomond.

properties.title: Balblair Distillery
properties.description: At Balblair, we believe in quality above all else so we don’t make that much.  We take our time with our hands-on approach to create a whisky with a distinctive taste and captivating multidimensional character. The result is a whisky crafted to perfection; elegantly understated, yet quietly self-assured.

properties.title: Ben Nevis Distillery
properties.description: Ben Nevis Distillery is one of the oldest licensed distilleries in Scotland and is home to The Legend of the Dew of Ben Nevis Visitor Centre.

properties.title: Benriach Distillery
properties.description: Come to Speyside and explore the rugged beauty of our home. Discover how our ingenious team collide, combine and intertwine multi-layered flavour combinations you'll remember long after you leave us.

properties.title: Benromach Distillery And Visitor's Centre
properties.description: Our distillery has been making Benromach since 1898 using the same spring water rising in nearby Romach Hills. Come and see our 3 distillers at work as they orchestrate every second of the production by sight, sound and touch. One of our friendly tour guides will proudly show you around our boby mill, mash tun, 4 wooden washbacks, 2 copper stills, spirit safe, filling room, dunnage warehouses and visitor centre with many mementoes. And, of course, you can enjoy a tutored tasting of our gorgeous classic Speyside Single Malt Whisky.

link.label: Discover Benromach Distillery And Visitor's Centre

properties.title: Bladnoch Distillery
properties.description: Bladnoch is a 203 year old Scotch Whisky Distillery offering tours and tastings.

properties.title: Blair Athol Distillery & Visitors Centre
properties.description: Blair Athol Distillery stands at the gateway to the Scottish Highlands in the picturesque town of Pitlochry, Perthshire. Set in open moorland south of the town, in the foothills of the Grampian mountains, Blair Athol’s ancient source of water – the Allt Dour – flows through the grounds from the slopes of Ben Vrackie, contributing to the whisky’s, mellow quality and smooth finish. Book your tour, experience or tasting on our website today.

link.label: Discover Blair Athol Distillery & Visitors Centre

properties.title: Bowmore Distillery
properties.description: Visit the first recorded distillery on Islay and one of the oldest in the whole of Scotland. There is no better tour - comprehensive, visually arresting, and well-planned, delivered with wit and nuggets of local knowledge - one gets the feeling that the tour has been specifically tailored just for you.

properties.title: Bruichladdich Distillery
properties.description: One of nine distilleries found on Islay, Bruichladdich still uses traditional Victorian machinery to make its whisky.

properties.title: Campbeltown Heritage Centre
properties.description: Learn about the fascinating life and times of Campbeltown at its superb local history museum.

properties.title: Caol Ila Distillery Visitor Centre
properties.description: Pronounced 'Cull-Eela', the distillery is situated on the North-Eastern shores of Islay with magnificent views across the Sound of Islay to the spectacular Paps of Jura. Newly re-opened on 25th August 2022 as Caol Ila, The Islay Home of Johnnie Walker, book your experience online to be one of the first to visit.

link.label: Discover Caol Ila Distillery Visitor Centre

properties.title: Cardhu Distillery & Visitors Centre
properties.description: Discover the warm-hearted spirit of our Speyside home where we create our premium whisky, evoking ripe orchard fruit, fresh grass, and mellow cereal. Come experience the warmest of welcomes, the heartfelt embrace of Cardhu, the Speyside Home of Johnnie Walker.

properties.title: Clynelish Distillery & Visitors Centre
properties.description: Clynelish proudly serves as one of the Four Corners distilleries of Johnnie Walker. We distil the rich Highland Malt that is enjoyed around the world on its own and as a vital component of Johnnie Walker whiskies.

properties.title: Cragganmore Distillery & Visitor Centre
properties.description: From its beautiful Spey Valley location to its unique flat top stills, Cragganmore distillery is well worth a visit. Book your tour online today to start planning your visit.

properties.title: Dallas Dhu Historic Distillery
properties.description: A perfectly preserved time capsule of the distiller's art.

properties.title: Dalwhinnie Distillery Visitor Centre & Whisky Shop
properties.description: Dalwhinnie Distillery is home to a famous Highland Single Malt Whisky renowned for its gentle flavours accentuated with notes of heather honey, citrus, vanilla and sweet malt.

link.label: Discover Dalwhinnie Distillery Visitor Centre & Whisky Shop

properties.title: Deanston Distillery and Visitor Centre
properties.description: Located 8 miles from Stirling and just 45min from Edinburgh and Glasgow, Deanston Distillery sits by the River Teith at the entrance to the dramatic Loch Lomond and Trossachs National Park.

link.label: Discover Deanston Distillery and Visitor Centre

properties.title: Dewar's Aberfeldy Distillery
properties.description: Tour Dewar's Aberfeldy Distillery and explore our interactive exhibition, before tasting whisky and soaking up the atmosphere in our welcoming Whisky Lounge and cafe.

properties.title: Eden Mill St Andrews Distillery
properties.description:
Eden Mill Distillery, Main Street. Guardbridge, St Andrews. Scotland. KY16 0US 
Contact us: hello@edenmill.com

link.label: Discover Eden Mill St Andrews Distillery

properties.title: European Bartender School
properties.description: European Bartender School is the world’s leading bartender school. Since 1999, we have trained 50,000+ students worldwide in the art of bartending. We now have 25+ schools across the globe and work with the industry’s elite bartenders.

properties.title: Fettercairn Distillery
properties.description: The Fettercairn Distillery is located in the foothills of Scotland's Cairngorms, half way between Aberdeen and Perth. Seize the opportunity to visit Fettercairn and discover how our unique spirit is crafted with one of our knowledgeable tour guides. Following each tour every adult can enjoy a dram or two of our exceptional Highland Single Malt.

properties.title: Glen Garioch Distillery
properties.description: Established in 1797, Glen Garioch, (pronounced 'Geery') is Scotland's most easterly distillery and is situated in the historic old town of Oldmeldrum near Aberdeen.

properties.title: Glen Grant Distillery and Garden
properties.description: Enjoy a wonderful and memorable day out at Glen Grant, tour the distillery and Victorian Garden and for those too young to tour the distillery, take part in the animal trail.

link.label: Discover Glen Grant Distillery and Garden

properties.title: Glen Moray Distillery
properties.description: A warm welcome awaits you at this friendly and informal working distillery in Elgin, the capital of Speyside.

properties.title: Glen Scotia
properties.description: One of Scotland's smallest whisky distilleries established in 1832

properties.title: Glendronach Distillery
properties.description: Take a look around one of Scotland's oldest working distilleries and discover the history and traditions of single malt whisky.

properties.title: Glenfarclas Distillery
properties.description: Glenfarclas is one of the few independent distilleries left in Scotland and provides a warm welcome in the dedicated visitor centre.

properties.title: Glenglassaugh Distillery
properties.description: Enjoy the stunning views over Sandend bay while you hear about the history of Glenglassaugh and get to see first-hand the traditional distilling methods still used at the distillery.

properties.title: Glengoyne Distillery
properties.description: Glengoyne Whisky Distillery sits snug at the foot of the Campsie Hills, 14 miles north of Glasgow near Loch Lomond, where it distils and matures world-renowned Single Malt Whisky.  Set in a hidden glen, next to a beautiful waterfall, Glengoyne is described as Scotland's most beautiful distillery.

properties.title: Glenkinchie Distillery & Visitor Centre
properties.description: Come explore our Victorian distillery and orchard gardens set within the abundant farmland and sweet-scented wildflowers of East Lothian, a mere 15 miles from Edinburgh. We look forward to welcoming you at Glenkinchie, the Lowland Home of Johnnie Walker.

properties.title: Glenmorangie Distillery
properties.description: By the tranquil shores of the Dornoch Firth, amidst the golden barley fields that border the Royal Burgh of Tain, lies the Glenmorangie Distillery where, accompanied by our expert guides, you will journey through all stages of our award-winning whisky creation, from mashing and fermenting to distilling and maturation.

properties.title: Hebridean Whisky Trail - Isle of Harris Distillery
properties.description: Embark on a whisky journey like no other - the Hebridean Whisky Trail is a uniquely wild and beautiful experience for those craving the spirit of adventure. Voyage across the seas to discover six remarkable distilleries and their friendly island communities on Skye, Raasay, Harris, Benbecula and Jura. A warm Hebridean welcome awaits you.

link.label: Discover Hebridean Whisky Trail - Isle of Harris Distillery

properties.title: Hebridean Whisky Trail - Isle of Raasay Distillery
properties.description: Embark on a whisky journey like no other - the Hebridean Whisky Trail is a uniquely wild and beautiful experience for those craving the spirit of adventure. Voyage across the seas to discover six remarkable distilleries and their friendly island communities on Skye, Raasay, Harris, Benbecula and Jura. A warm Hebridean welcome awaits you.

link.label: Discover Hebridean Whisky Trail - Isle of Raasay Distillery

properties.title: Hebridean Whisky Trail - Jura Distillery
properties.description: Embark on a whisky journey like no other - the Hebridean Whisky Trail is a uniquely wild and beautiful experience for those craving the spirit of adventure. Voyage across the seas to discover six remarkable distilleries and their friendly island communities on Skye, Raasay, Harris, Benbecula and Jura. A warm Hebridean welcome awaits you.

link.label: Discover Hebridean Whisky Trail - Jura Distillery

properties.title: Hebridean Whisky Trail - North Uist Distillery
properties.description: Embark on a whisky journey like no other - the Hebridean Whisky Trail is a uniquely wild and beautiful experience for those craving the spirit of adventure. Voyage across the seas to discover five remarkable distilleries and their friendly island communities on Skye, Raasay, Harris and Jura. A warm Hebridean welcome awaits you.

link.label: Discover Hebridean Whisky Trail - North Uist Distillery

properties.title: Hebridean Whisky Trail - Talisker Distillery
properties.description: Embark on a whisky journey like no other - the Hebridean Whisky Trail is a uniquely wild and beautiful experience for those craving the spirit of adventure. Voyage across the seas to discover six remarkable distilleries and their friendly island communities on Skye, Raasay, Harris, Benbecula and Jura. A warm Hebridean welcome awaits you.

link.label: Discover Hebridean Whisky Trail - Talisker Distillery

properties.title: Hebridean Whisky Trail - Torabhaig Distillery
properties.description: Embark on a whisky journey like no other - the Hebridean Whisky Trail is a uniquely wild and beautiful experience for those craving the spirit of adventure. Voyage across the seas to discover six remarkable distilleries and their friendly island communities on Skye, Raasay, Harris, Benbecula and Jura. A warm Hebridean welcome awaits you.

link.label: Discover Hebridean Whisky Trail - Torabhaig Distillery

properties.title: Highland Park Distillery And Visitor Centre
properties.description:
Age, experience, and tradition may define our whisky but it’s Orkney that sets it apart. Something magic happens here and the result is a wild harmony of contrasting flavours found in our single malt.
Highland Park Single Malt Scotch Whisky, crafted in Orkney since 1798.

link.label: Discover Highland Park Distillery And Visitor Centre

properties.title: Holyrood Distillery
properties.description: Holyrood Distillery is an exciting new attraction and single malt whisky distillery, which opened in heart of Edinburgh in 2019. It includes guided experiential tours, a gin distillery, a whisky distillery, a bar with enviable views of Holyrood Park, and a destination spirits and gift shop. Holyrood Distillery was voted Visitor Attraction of the Year 2021 (Icons of Whisky).

properties.title: Isle of Jura Distillery
properties.description: Visit this small distillery located on one of Scotland's most spectacular but remote islands.

properties.title: Isle of Raasay Distillery
properties.description: Visit the first legal distillery on the Isle of Raasay, a remote Hebridean island with just 160 residents. It is our vision to create the finest Hebridean single malt Scotch whisky and a unique whisky destination with arguably the best view from any distillery in Scotland.

properties.title: Johnnie Walker Princes Street
properties.description: Johnnie Walker Princes Street offers a personalised whisky experience where you can explore the flavours of Scotland in the heart of Edinburgh.

properties.title: Kilchoman Distillery
properties.description: A great distillery to visit to experience the complete whisky making process, from barley to bottle. Friendly and knowledgeable staff and a busy, cozy cafe serving lunches, homemade cakes and barista style coffee. Tastings are available throughout the day and do not require advanced booking. Booking for tours advisable.

properties.title: Kingsbarns Distillery and Visitor Centre
properties.description: Conveniently located close to the home of golf, St Andrews, the Kingsbarns Distillery and Visitor Centre sits in a charming 18th century farm steading and features an exhibition, whisky and gin distillery tours, tastings, shop and cafe with outdoor seating area. Open 7 days.

link.label: Discover Kingsbarns Distillery and Visitor Centre

properties.title: Lagavulin Distillery Visitor Centre
properties.description: Situated in a small bay near the south coast of Islay near the ruins of Dunyveg Castle, Lagavulin Distillery is thought to be one of the longest established distilleries in the country.

properties.title: Lagg Distillery
properties.description: Lagg Distillery is the newest distillery based on the southern tip of the Isle of Arran. Producing a heavily peated spirit, Lagg Distillery offers distillery tours as well as a choice of two dining options, a distillery shop and much more.

properties.title: Laphroaig Distillery
properties.description:
See where the world’s most richly flavoured whisky is produced in the Isle of Islay.

Laphroaig (La-froyg) is the story of a community. An uncompromising, tough and determined group of people who work to ensure that this defining whisky has always remained true to its origins

These origins can be found in Islay itself - its harsh climate and tough landscape have created a hardy people whose single-mindedness and honesty is as distinctive as Laphroaig.

properties.title: Lind & Lime Gin Distillery
properties.description:
Lind & Lime Gin Distillery Tour, Tasting, Bottle Filling & Cocktail Making. 
When it came to creating our tour, we decided to put all of our favourite things into the single best experience that we could.

properties.title: Lochranza Distillery
properties.description: The Isle of Arran's first distillery is open all year round for guided tours and whisky tasting, with a variety of whiskies on sale in the gift shop.

properties.title: Nc’nean Distillery
properties.description: Opened in July 2017 and believed to be Scotland's first organic distillery, Ncn’ean is a young independent whisky distillery on the Morvern peninsula focused on creating new flavours and sustainable production.

properties.title: Oban Distillery & Visitor Centre
properties.description: This small and historic distillery is located in the charming coast town of Oban.

properties.title: Pulteney Distillery
properties.description: The Pulteney Distillery is the most northerly on the mainland, and continues to make malt whisky using traditional methods nearly two centuries after its opening.

properties.title: Royal Lochnagar Distillery & Visitors Centre
properties.description: Royal Lochnagar distillery is situated on the south side of the River Dee close to Balmoral Castle. Age old traditions and craftmanship produce one of Scotland's most exclusive whiskies. A visit to Royal Lochnagar is a timeless experience.

link.label: Discover Royal Lochnagar Distillery & Visitors Centre

properties.title: Scapa Distillery
properties.description:
We are delighted to re-open our Visitor Centre, although we are currently unable to offer tours our shop is open Monday to Friday and we offer daily tastings bookable online at www.scapawhisky.com.
For any further enquiries, please call us directly on 01856 873269 or email scapa.admin@pernod-ricard.com.

properties.title: Scotch Whisky Experience - Visitor Attraction
properties.description: Discover how single malt Scotch whisky is made, a process unchanged through the centuries, before your expert guide imparts the secrets of the Whisky regions. Finally, you'll choose your perfect 'dram', and taste it in one of The World's Largest Whisky Collections.

link.label: Discover Scotch Whisky Experience - Visitor Attraction

properties.title: Speyburn Distillery
properties.description: Distilled since 1897 in the world-renowned Speyside region of Scotland, Speyburn Distillery embodies the generations of commitment, experience and tradition that go into producing award-winning single malt scotch whisky.

properties.title: Springbank Whisky Distillers
properties.description: Scotland's national drink has been produced at Springbank Whisky Distillers and today it is one of the oldest family-run and owned distilleries in Scotland.

properties.title: Strathisla Distillery
properties.description: WELCOME TO STRATHISLA DISTILLERY HOME OF CHIVAS

properties.title: Talisker Distillery & Visitors Centre
properties.description:
Talisker is the oldest working distillery on the Isle of Skye and is set on the shores of Loch Harport with dramatic views of the Cuillins. After undergoing an exciting renovation project, Talisker distillery re-opened its doors to the public on 5th August 2022. 
Book one of the brand-new tours or tasting experiences at Talisker distillery today and start planning your visit.

properties.title: The Balvenie Distillery
properties.description: The Balvenie is unlike all other single malt Scotch whiskies, thanks to a unique combination of human craft and natural alchemy.

properties.title: The Borders Distillery
properties.description:
The first Scotch Whisky Distillery in the Scottish Borders since 1837, offering a fascinating tour of how we make our whisky, gin, and vodka.
Tours run at 11am, 1pm and 3pm Monday-Saturday. Please call the distillery to book your tour in advance or book online. We welcome groups of up to 12, and are fully wheelchair accessible. You can also find us on the Welcome App.

properties.title: The Botanist Gin
properties.description: The Botanist Gin is a progressive exploration of the botanical heritage of our Island. Distilled using 22 hand-foraged Islay botanicals, The Botanist is a gin of layered complexity.

properties.title: The Clydeside Distillery
properties.description: The Clydeside Distillery is a Single Malt Scotch Whisky distillery, visitor experience, café, and specialist whisky shop in the heart of Glasgow; Glasgow’s first dedicated Single Malt Scotch Whisky Distillery for over 100 years.

properties.title: The Dram Queen
properties.description: Ann Miller, the Dram Queen, offers independent, informative and entertaining bespoke Scotch whisky experiences in which she shares her passion, knowledge and behind the scenes expertise.

properties.title: The GlenAllachie Distillery
properties.description: Crowned Visitor Attraction of the Year at the Icons of Whisky Awards 2022, The GlenAllachie is one of Scotland’s few independently owned and managed distilleries. Led by industry veteran, Billy Walker, who boasts an almost 50-year tenure in whisky, our passionate team are focused upon quality over quantity. Discover more about the award- winning Speyside single malt Scotch whiskies at our Distillery Visitor Centre.

properties.title: The Glenlivet Distillery
properties.description: We invite you to the heart of Scotland’s whisky-making country to see it for yourself. Here, you can experience the rare conditions of our remote location. You’ll learn how our founder, George Smith, established the first licensed distillery in the parish of Glenlivet, and defended it from smugglers.

properties.title: The Glenturret Distillery
properties.description:
The Glenturret Distillery is Scotland’s oldest working distillery and welcomes visitors for excellent Distillery tours giving an up-close view on traditional whisky making.  The Glenturret gift shop offers a fantastic range of single malts that make dram fine gifts for family, friends … or even to treat yourself.  
The Glenturret Distillery re-opens on 26 April 2021.

properties.title: The Macallan Distillery
properties.description: In the heart of the beautiful Macallan Estate, personal service and a warm greeting await every guest at The Macallan Distillery Experience.

properties.title: The Singleton of Glen Ord Distillery, Visitor Centre & Whisky Shop
properties.description: A visit to The Singleton Distillery, on the edge of the Black Isle in the Highlands west of Inverness, is a delight to both the eye and the palate.

link.label: Discover The Singleton of Glen Ord Distillery, Visitor Centre & Whisky Shop

properties.title: Tobermory Distillery
properties.description: Located in the heart of the Isle of Mull's capital, Tobermory Distillery, established in 1798, the original and only distillery on the island and one of the oldest commercial distilleries in Scotland.

properties.title: Tomatin Distillery
properties.description: Experience the 'softer side of the Highlands' at Tomatin Distillery, where you will find a range of tours and award winning malts!  We are located 16 miles south of Inverness and 15 miles north of Aviemore on the A9.

properties.title: Torabhaig Distillery
properties.description:
Opening Hours from 1st April 2023
Shop opening hours are Monday to Friday 10am - 5pm and, Saturday and Sunday 10am - 3pm 
Cafe opening hours are Monday to Friday 10am - 4pm
Tours and times can be found can be found on torabhaig.com.   Included on each tour is a tasting of our Torabhaig Allt Gleann.
For updated information please check the booking portal on our website:  www.torabhaig.com
We look forward to being able to welcome you to Torabhaig Distillery Visitor Centre

properties.title: Tullibardine Distillery & Visitor Centre
properties.description: Tullibardine Distillery is located in Blackford, Perthshire - the gateway to the Scottish Highlands.

properties.title: Uile-bheist Brewery & Distillery
properties.description: Rising from the banks of the River Ness, Uile-bheist (pronounced Ewl-uh-vehst) - Scottish Gaelic for 'monster', is the realisation of its Founders' long-held ambition to create the finest artisan whisky & beer in the heart of Inverness.
